title: Proposals for the furtherance and propagation of the gospel in this nation. As the same were hubly presented to the Honourable Committee of Parliament by divers ministers of the gospell, and others. As also, some principles of Christian religion, without the beliefe of which, the Scriptures doe plainly and clearly affirme, salvation is not to be obtained. Which were also presented in explanation of one of the said proposals.
author: Owen, John, 1616-1683.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for R. Ibbitson dwelling in Smith-field neer Hosier Lane,
